text: Georg Friedrich (born 31 October 1966) is an Austrian actor. He appeared in more than eighty films since 1984. In 2017 he played in the German movie Wild by Nicolette Krebitz.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4071086 He won the Silver Bear for Best Actor at the 2017 Berlin Film Festival for his performance in the film Bright Nights. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
